item.description:
OUR SECOND CHANCE!

UPDATE:Hot off the press..Location of the caucuses and the breakdown of delegates allocated to McCain and Romney per district:

http://www.massgop.co...

Caucus doors open at 9 and close at 10. You must be inside and registered by 10am!

Win Massachusetts Caucus Delegates ?

Help win 22 delegates for Ron Paul at the 10 congressional districts across Massachusetts. Specific caucus (meeting) locations and the time will be announced here after Feb. 11.

With Romney's withdrawal/suspension from the race the 22 delegates he won are now up for grabs. Any vote at the convention for Romney will be for form only. Delegates from Massachusetts will be able to support Ron Paul at the National Convention . Let's follow through on our comittment to support Ron Paul at this critical time.

REMEMBER:

Make sure you are a registered Republican by Wed., Feb. 13!

Make sure you attend the caucus on Saturday, April 5 in your congressional district.

Make sure you bring every Republican relative and friend with you!

AND make sure you vote only for the slate of candidates (1-3 delegates and 1-3 alternates) that is sponsored by the Ron Paul campaign or your local Ron Paul Meetup!

The rules and procedure (note Sections 4.4 and 4.5 in particular) for the caucus can be read here:http://files.meetup.c...

To find out which congressional district you are in click here: http://www.wheredoivo...

After you enter your information scroll down to "District, Representatives-Congressional" This is the name of your US Congressperson and your congressional district number.

If you want to be a delegate and/or will help organize Ron Paul supporters in your district to attend the caucus please RSVP to this event with your Congressional District number and contact information. I can be reached at 617 436-0320 or 617 435-2057.

If you would like to help put financially with ongoing grassroots efforts you can contribute here.
item.name: Win Massachusetts Caucus Delegates for Ron Paul on April 5!
